name: The Great Battle (jimd)
description:
This game was made using free assets from the internet ( see CREDITS ) .

You can call it a prototype but it 's fully playable .

At some point i will make a 2d/3d version of the game with all the goodies a game have (score , special FX  , cut scenes , ect.)using maybe another "Hero".

I hope you like it.

Have fun .
